description: Ransomware affiliates exploit a critical security vulnerability in SonicWall SonicOS firewall devices to breach victims' networks. [...]
title: Critical SonicWall SSLVPN bug exploited in ransomware attacks

description: The Quad7 botnet is expanding its targeting scope with the addition of new clusters and custom implants that now also target Zyxel VPN appliances and Ruckus wireless routers. [...]
title: Quad7 botnet targets more SOHO and VPN routers, media servers

description: New attacks attributed to China-based cyber espionage group Mustang Panda show that the threat actor switched to new strategies and malware called FDMTP and PTSOCKET to download payloads and steal information from breached networks. [...]
title: Chinese hackers use new data theft malware in govt attacks

description: Highline Public Schools, a K-12 district in Washington state, has shut down all schools and canceled school activities after its technology systems were compromised in a cyberattack. [...]
title: Highline Public Schools closes schools following cyberattack

description: A privacy flaw in WhatsApp, an instant messenger with over 2 billion users worldwide, is being exploited by attackers to bypass the app's "View once" feature and view messages again. [...]
title: Meta fixes easily bypassed WhatsApp ‘View Once’ privacy feature

description: Payment gateway provider Slim CD has disclosed a data breach that compromised credit card and personal data belonging to almost 1.7 million individuals. [...]
title: Payment gateway data breach affects 1.7 million credit card owners

description: While not very sophisticated, brute force password attacks pose a significant threat to an organization's security. Learn more from Specops Software about these types of attacks and how to defend against them. [...]
title: How to defend against brute force and password spray attacks
